DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, gain 1 dexterity this turn only.

This card's primary effects are active while in your hand. A Gift may also have an additional effects with triggers.
Blasted creatures lose both HP and Max HP at the start of their turn. Each turn, the blast worsens, but the worse the blast is the more likely it is to wear off.

A stunned target does nothing this turn.
The primary target takes the full effect. ALL OTHER targets take half the amount.

The card's effect is automatically activated and the card is immediately purged. This does not count as playing the card.
